entry.title: Friday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:00 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:00 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022
